blogPost.title: Why do we fight, and how do we stop? Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: なぜ人は戦うのか、どうすればやめられるのか？Answer by @lukeburgis, Author of Wanting. https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
我们为什么要打架，我们如何停止？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz
我們爲什麼要打架，我們如何停止？回答者：@lukeburgis，《想》作者。https://t.co/zAMDip1ZpS https://t.co/UjRGAy5Ukz

previous.title: How can you avoid being a 'taker' in a conversation? Answer by @xsvengoechea, author of Listen Like You Mean it. https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET

localize.full_text: 会話の中で "Taker "にならないためには？Answer by @xsvengoechea, author of Listen Like You Mean it. https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET
如何避免在谈话中成为一个 "索取者"？回答者：@xsvengoechea，《认真倾听》作者。https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET
如何避免在談話中成爲一個 "索取者"？回答者：@xsvengoechea，《認真傾聽》作者。https://t.co/lrQdiZGOkw https://t.co/Mq2B9obJET

next.title: Why did you feel it was important for you as tech insiders to speak up about a topic that many others are running from? Answer by Ben Pring, author of MONSTER: A Tough Love Letter to the Machines That Rule our Jobs, Lives, and Future. https://t.co/wHLBAO7SO1 https://t.co/IWVdR4SLvc

localize.full_text: 多くの人が逃げ腰になっているテーマについて、テックインサイダーであるあなた方が声を上げることが重要だと感じたのはなぜでしょうか？MONSTER: A Tough Love Letter to the Machines That Rule our Jobs, Lives, and Future』の著者、ベン・プリン氏による回答 https://t.co/wHLBAO7SO1 https://t.co/IWVdR4SLvc
为什么你们觉得作为技术业内人士，对一个许多人都在逃避的话题发表意见很重要？https://t.co/wHLBAO7SO1 https://t.co/IWVdR4SLvc 《怪物：给统治我们工作、生活和未来的机器的一封严厉的情书》的作者本-普林的回答。
爲什麼你們覺得作爲技術業內人士，對一個許多人都在逃避的話題發表意見很重要？https://t.co/wHLBAO7SO1 https://t.co/IWVdR4SLvc 《怪物：給統治我們工作、生活和未來的機器的一封嚴厲的情書》的作者本-普林的回答。
